name: Animals Minus a Little Something Online Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text: The sounds that European elk make.
questions.explanation:
Moose moos.

	Yes, the animal known as a "moose" in the United States is called an "elk" in Europe. And the animal Americans call an "elk" is a "red deer" in Europe! Confusing, eh?

questions.text: Skin covering of a raccoon-like South American animal.
questions.explanation:
Coati coat.

	This animal resembles a skinny raccoon with a flexible nose. Its full name is "coatimundi."

questions.text: Someone who touches large fish inappropriately.
questions.explanation:
Grouper groper.

	Groupers are large marine fish.

questions.text: Place where a large antelope is found.
questions.explanation:
Eland land.

	The eland is the largest of the antelopes.

questions.text: Noisy crowlike bird that can't take his eyes off you.
Equipment that a ferret uses to paint.
Prickly seed that bothers a donkey.
Unit of measure used by a small songbird.
What a large aquatic weasel writes with.
